Package net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.services

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SimpleServiceConnection.InstanceBinder<BS extends android.app.Service>
    The binder provided by the service needs to implement this interface, which provides us with a standard way to reach into the service's own public methods.
    SimpleServiceConnection.Listener<LS extends android.app.Service>
    Because connections can take a while, the object that is waiting for the connection to be completed should implement this interface to receive a signal when the connection is established.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SimpleServiceConnection<S extends android.app.Service>
    This class provides a simple, consistent implementation of a service binding, so that neither the service nor the consumer of that service is required to have its own implementation.
    SimpleTestServiceConnection<S extends android.app.Service>
    Extends SimpleServiceConnection to provide connectivity to services within an Android test case.
    SingletonService
    This service provides "singleton" instances of any specified class.
    SingletonServiceTest
    Exercises SingletonService.
    SingletonServiceTest.FirstContext
    Provides one of the multiple contexts across which we will test the service instance.
    SingletonServiceTest.SecondContext
    Provides one of the multiple contexts across which we will test the service instance.
    SingletonServiceTest.SingletonServiceTestContext
    Provides one of the multiple contexts across which we will test the service instance.
